name: Everyone In Their Right Place
description:
In “Everyone in Their Right Place”, you play as a ghost of a damaged teenager trying to navigate his way through all of his traumatizing memories and find a way to survive Dr. Y’s hellish clinic. 

You control the ghost and navigate through various rooms to piece together the ghost’s story, while making decisions along the way; either with or against the doctor’s will. You will need to decide what is the best choice to survive, even if it means succumbing to the doctor’s wishes, and never playing video games again. One wrong choice and you might never be able to return to the world. Becareful with your choices.

This game is hand-drawn and is partially based on the infamous Dr. Yang and his controversial addiction treatment centers in China and my personal experiences.
